SM.dic.graficos

Interface AtrShape

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.awt.Shape
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Arco, Cubic, Elipse, Linea, Punto, Quad, Rectangulo, RectanguloRedondeado, TrazoLibre

    public interface AtrShape
extends java.awt.Shape
    Interfaz que representa una forma geométrica
